title: NAGA X4 在飞行测试中速度达到40米/秒
title_en: NAGA X4 Speed Reach 40m/s In Flight Test

frame.src: company_news/NAGA X4 速度+击落靶机（谨慎发布）.mp4

frame.txt: 作为一款可靠且卓越的多功能高速无人机，中航通研发的NAGA X4在飞行测试中速度达到了每秒40米。
frame.txt_en: The ZHT NAGA X4 as a reliable and excellent multi-functional high speed drone, the speed reached 40 Metre per second in flight test.
